attributes.action: Don't close schools. Children's future are at risk.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government or parliament to do this because it will save many children and teenagers future. They will also become successful in life and have a career of their own. If we keep putting barriers in the way like lockdowns we will continuously be ruining children's future. Having lockdowns which close schools affects a child's mental health and wellbeing. Closing schools doesn't stop the spread of COVID 19, if we are in lockdown and quarantining there is no chance of Corona spreading.
attributes.background: I want the government to leave schools and colleges open. Closing schools affects a child's grade, their future and their career. This many not affect the government or parliament but affects every child within this community. Teenagers GCSE's affected, as well as, making their future vulnerable.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
